alert.note: Alert for Estill; Jackson; Lee; Owsley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 2:28AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Owsley, south central Estill, northeastern Jackson and southwestern Lee Counties through 300 AM EDT... At 227 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brazil, or near McKee, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Macedonia around 235 AM EDT. Wind Cave, Lakes, New Zion, Turkey Foot, Drip Rock and Alumbaugh around 240 AM EDT. Old Orchard, Arvel and Leighton around 245 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Banford, Earnestville, Wild Dog, Willow Shoals, Evelyn, Pinnacle, Caryton, Cressmont, Heidelberg, Ida May, Delvinta, Yellow Rock, Vincent, Travellers Rest, White Ash, Belle Point, Pebworth, Levi and Scoville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
